pageContext.claim: “I hate to say, remember the Democrats, ‘You don't need walls.’ Oh, really? ‘We need drones.’ They wanted us to put drones flying around, taking pictures of everybody.”
pageContext.analysis: This is false. Many Democrats support upgraded fencing to replace the dilapidated barriers along the southern border. Such fencing upgrades were part of the comprehensive immigration overhaul that passed the Senate in 2013, for example. Another component of the same package was surveillance drones.
